title: Underwater medicine
creator_credit: Bruce Davis and Australia. Dept. of the Navy
brief_description: Shows the work on prevention and treatment of ailments afflicting divers being done by the School of Underwater Medicine at HMAS Penguin, a Naval shore establishment at Balmoral, Sydney. Shows the treatment of injured civilian diver, the education of medical personnel and the research projects being undertaken by the school in association with Sydney universities.
